COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping global and VLAN configurations.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping global and VLAN configurations.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE:
This example shows how to display IGMP snooping configurations: Switch# show ip igmp snooping Global IGMP Snooping configuration: -------------------------------------+----------- Igmp Snooping : Enabled Fast-Leave : Disabled Report-Suppression : Enabled Version : 2 Robustness Variable : 2 Max Member Number : 2048 Unknown Multicast Behavior : Flood
VLAN 1: -------- Igmp Snooping : Enabled Fast-Leave : Disabled Report-Suppression : Enabled Version : 2 Robustness Variable : 2 Max Member Number : 2048 Unknown Multicast Behavior : Flood Group Access-list : N/A Mrouter Port Aging Interval (sec) : 255 Mrouter Port : eth-0-4(static)
COMMAND.CTCRCMD: show ip igmp snooping global show ip igmp snooping vlan

COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping global
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping global configurations.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping global configurations.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to display IGMP snooping global configurations: Switch# show ip igmp snooping global Global IGMP Snooping configuration: -------------------------------------+----------- Igmp Snooping : Enabled Fast-Leave : Disabled Report-Suppression : Enabled Version : 2 Robustness Variable : 2 Max Member Number : 2048 Unknown Multicast Behavior : Flood
COMMAND.CTCRCMD: show ip igmp snooping show ip igmp snooping vlan

COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping vlan
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping VLAN configurations.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping VLAN configurations.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE:
This example shows how to display IGMP snooping configurations of VLAN 2: Switch# show ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Global IGMP Snooping configuration: -------------------------------------+----------- Igmp Snooping : Enabled Fast-Leave : Disabled Report-Suppression : Enabled Version : 2 Robustness Variable : 2 Max Member Number : 2048 Unknown Multicast Behavior : Flood
VLAN 2: -------- Igmp Snooping : Enabled Fast-Leave : Disabled Report-Suppression : Enabled Version : 2 Robustness Variable : 2 Max Member Number : 2048 Unknown Multicast Behavior : Flood Group Access-list : N/A Mrouter Port Aging Interval (sec) : 255 Mrouter Port :
COMMAND.CTCRCMD: show ip igmp snooping show ip igmp snooping global

COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping querier
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping querier configurations.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping querier configurations.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE:
This example shows how to display IGMP snooping querier configurations: Switch# show ip igmp snooping querier Global Igmp Snooping Querier Configuration: -------------------------------------+----------- Version : 2 Last Member Query Count : 2 Last Member Query Interval (msec) : 1000 Max Query Response Time (sec) : 10 Query Interval (sec) : 125 Global Source Address : 0.0.0.0 TCN Query : Disabled TCN Query Count : 2 TCN Query Interval (sec) : 10 TCN Query Max Respose Time (sec) : 5
VLAN 1: -------------------------------------+----------- Elected querier is : 0.0.0.0 -------------------------------------+----------- Admin State : Disabled Admin Version : 2 Operational State : Non-Querier Querier Configure Address : N/A Querier Operational Address : 0.0.0.0 Last Member Query Count : 2 Last Member Query Interval (msec) : 1000 Max Query Response Time (sec) : 10 Query Interval (sec) : 125 Querier Timeout (sec) : 255

COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping mrouter
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping mrouter configurations.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping mrouter configurations.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to display IGMP snooping mrouter configurations: Switch# show ip igmp snooping mrouter VLAN Interface Mode Uptime Expires-time --------+----------------+--------+---------------+--------------- 1 eth-0-9 dynamic 00:04:38 243 1 eth-0-2 static - -
COMMAND.CTCRCMD: show ip igmp snooping mrouter interface

COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping groups
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping groups.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping groups, includes static and dynamic.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to display IGMP snooping groups inforamtion: Switch# show ip igmp snooping groups VLAN Interface Group-Address Uptime Expires-time --------+--------------+----------------+--------------+-------------- 2 eth-0-1 224.2.3.4 00:00:04 stopped 2 eth-0-2 230.1.1.1 00:00:03 00:04:17
COMMAND.CTCRCMD: show ip igmp snooping groups count static-group

COMMAND.name: show ip igmp snooping groups count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to display IGMP snooping groups count.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to display IGMP snooping groups count.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to display IGMP snooping groups count inforamtion: Switch# show ip igmp snooping groups count Dynamic Multicast Groups Count : 0 Static Multicast Groups Count : 0 (Active : 0) Total Multicast Groups Count : 0 (Active : 0)
COMMAND.CTCRCMD: show ip igmp snooping groups static-group

COMMAND.name: clear ip igmp snooping group
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to clear IGMP snooping dynamic groups.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to clear IGMP snooping all dynamic groups, or dynamic groups of specific VLAN and/or address.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE:
This example shows how to clear all IGMP snooping dynamic groups: Switch# clear ip igmp snooping group
This example shows how to clear IGMP snooping dynamic groups of VLAN 2: Switch# clear ip igmp snooping group vlan 2

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable global IGMP snooping.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable global IGMP snooping. By default, IGMP snooping should be enabled.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable global IGMP snooping: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable global IGMP snooping.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable global IGMP snooping.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable global IGMP snooping: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping version
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping version. The parameter range is [1, 3].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping version.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping version: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping version 3

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping version
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping version to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping version to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping version to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping version

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping fast-leave
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable global IGMP snooping fast-leave.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable global IGMP snooping fast-leave.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable global IGMP snooping fast-leave: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping fast-leave

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping fast-leave
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable global IGMP snooping fast-leave.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable global IGMP snooping fast-leave.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable global IGMP snooping fast-leave: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping fast-leave

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping last-member-query-count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping last member query count. The parameter range is [2, 7].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping last member query count.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping last-member-query-count: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping last-member-query-count 3

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping last-member-query-count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping last member query count to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping last member query count to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to clear global IGMP snooping last-member-query-count: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping last-member-query-count

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping last-member-query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping last member query interval. The parameter range is [1000, 25500] milliseconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping last member query interval.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping last member query interval: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping last-member-query-interval 2000

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping last-member-query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping last member query interval to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping last member query interval to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping last member query interval to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping last-member-query-interval

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping robustness-variable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping robustness variable. The parameter range is [2, 7].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping robustness variable.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping robustness variable: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping robustness-variable 4

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping robustness-variable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping robustness variable to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping robustness variable to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping robustness variable: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping robustness-variable

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping discard-unknown
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable global IGMP snooping discard unknown multicast traffic.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable global IGMP snooping discard unknown multicast traffic.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable global IGMP snooping discard unknown multicast traffic: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping discard-unknown

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping discard-unknown
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable global IGMP snooping discard unknown multicast traffic.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable global IGMP snooping discard unknown multicast traffic.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable global IGMP snooping discard unknown multicast traffic: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping discard-unknown

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping report-suppression
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable global IGMP snooping report suppression.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable global IGMP snooping report suppression.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable global IGMP snooping report suppression: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping report-suppression

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping report-suppression
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable global IGMP snooping report suppression.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable global IGMP snooping report suppression.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable global IGMP snooping report suppression: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping report-suppression

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping querier query-interval. The parameter range is [2, 18000] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping querier query-interval.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping querier query-interval: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping querier query-interval 1000

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping querier query-interval to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping querier query-interval to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping querier query-interval to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping querier query-interval

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier max-response-time
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping querier max response time. The parameter range is [1, 25] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping querier max response time.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping querier max response time: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping querier max-response-time 5

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier max-response-time
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure global IGMP snooping querier max response time to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure global IGMP snooping querier max response time to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure global IGMP snooping querier max response time to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping querier max-response-time

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping global source-address
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping global source-address.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping global source-address.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping global source-address: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping global source-address 10.10.10.1

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping global source-address
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to clear IGMP snooping global source-address.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to clear IGMP snooping global source-address.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to clear IGMP snooping global source-address: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping global source-address

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping max-member-num
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping global max member number. The parameter range is [1, 2048].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping global max member number.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping max member number: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping max-member-num 1024

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping max-member-num
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping global max member number to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping global max member number to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping max member number to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping max-member-num

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier tcn
COMMAND.help: IGMP snooping querier TCN related parameters

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier tcn
COMMAND.help: IGMP snooping querier TCN related parameters

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier tcn enable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable IGMP snooping querier TCN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable IGMP snooping querier TCN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable IGMP snooping querier TCN: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping querier tcn enable

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier tcn enable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable IGMP snooping querier TCN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable IGMP snooping querier TCN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable IGMP snooping querier TCN: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping querier tcn enable

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query count. The parameter range is [1, 10].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query count.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query count: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-count 5

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query count to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query count to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query count to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-count

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query interval. The parameter range is [1, 255] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query interval.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query interval: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-interval 5

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query interval to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query interval to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN query interval to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-interval

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-max-response-time

PARAM.name: time
PARAM.help: TCN query max response time value (Default: 5)

COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN max response time. The parameter range is [1, 10] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN max response time.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN max response time: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-max-response-time 4

COMMAND.name: no ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-max-response-time
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN max response time to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN max response time to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier TCN max response time to default value: Switch(config)# no ip igmp snooping querier tcn query-max-response-time

COMMAND.name: ip igmp snooping vlan
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enter IGMP snooping VLAN view.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enter IGMP snooping VLAN view.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enter IGMP snooping VLAN view: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)#

COMMAND.name: do
COMMAND.help: To run exec commands in config mode

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

COMMAND.name: enable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable IGMP snooping on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable IGMP snooping on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable IGMP snooping on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# enable

COMMAND.name: no enable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable IGMP snooping on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable IGMP snooping on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable IGMP snooping on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no enable

COMMAND.name: version
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping version on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [1, 3].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping version on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping version on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# version 3

COMMAND.name: no version
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping version on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping version on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping version on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no version

COMMAND.name: fast-leave
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable IGMP snooping fast leave on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable IGMP snooping fast leave on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable IGMP snooping fast leave on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# fast-leave

COMMAND.name: no fast-leave
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable IGMP snooping fast leave on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable IGMP snooping fast leave on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable IGMP snooping fast leave on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no fast-leave

COMMAND.name: last-member-query-count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping last member query count on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [2, 7].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping last member query count on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping last member query count on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# last-member-query-count 3

COMMAND.name: no last-member-query-count
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping last member query count on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping last member query count on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping last member query count on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no last-member-query-count

COMMAND.name: last-member-query-interval

PARAM.name: interval
PARAM.help: Last Member Query Interval value (Default: 1000 ms)

COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping last member query interval on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [1000, 25500] milliseconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping last member query interval on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping last member query interval on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# last-member-query-interval 2000

COMMAND.name: no last-member-query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping last member query interval on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping last member query interval on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping last member query interval on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no last-member-query-interval

COMMAND.name: robustness-variable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping robustness variable on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [2, 7].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping robustness variable on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping robustness variable on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# robustness-variable 3

COMMAND.name: no robustness-variable
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping robustness variable on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping robustness variable on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping robustness variable on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no robustness-variable

COMMAND.name: discard-unknown
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable IGMP snooping discard unknown on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable IGMP snooping discard unknown on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable IGMP snooping discard unknown on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# discard-unknown

COMMAND.name: no discard-unknown
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable IGMP snooping discard unknown on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable IGMP snooping discard unknown on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable IGMP snooping discard unknown on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no discard-unknown

COMMAND.name: report-suppression
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable IGMP snooping report suppression on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable IGMP snooping report suppression on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable IGMP snooping report suppression on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# report-suppression

COMMAND.name: no report-suppression
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable IGMP snooping report suppression on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable IGMP snooping report suppression on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable IGMP snooping report suppression on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no report-suppression

COMMAND.name: max-member-num

PARAM.name: number
PARAM.help: Max Allowed Member Number on this vlan (Default: 2048)

COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping max member number on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [1, 2048].
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping max member number on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping max member number on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# max-member-num 10

COMMAND.name: no max-member-num
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping max member number on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping max member number on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping max member number on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no max-member-num

COMMAND.name: querier
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to enable IGMP snooping querier on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to enable IGMP snooping querier on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to enable IGMP snooping querier on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# querier

COMMAND.name: no querier
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to disable IGMP snooping querier on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to disable IGMP snooping querier on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to disable IGMP snooping querier on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no querier

COMMAND.name: querier query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier query-interval on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [2, 18000] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier query-interval on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier query-interval on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# querier query-interval 10

COMMAND.name: no querier query-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier query-interval on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier query-interval on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier query-interval on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no querier query-interval

COMMAND.name: querier timeout
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier timeout on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [60, 300] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier timeout on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier timeout on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# querier timeout 100

COMMAND.name: no querier timeout
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier timeout on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier timeout on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier timeout on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no querier timeout

COMMAND.name: querier max-response-time
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier max response time on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [1, 25] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier max response time on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier max response time on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# querier max-response-time 5

COMMAND.name: no querier max-response-time
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier max response time on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier max response time on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier max response time on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no querier max-response-time

COMMAND.name: querier address
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping querier address on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping querier address on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure IGMP snooping querier address on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# querier address 12.1.1.1

COMMAND.name: no querier address
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to delete IGMP snooping querier address on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to delete IGMP snooping querier address on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to delete IGMP snooping querier address on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no querier address

COMMAND.name: static-group
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to add IGMP snooping static group entry on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to add IGMP snooping static group entry on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to add IGMP snooping static group entry on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# static-group 224.10.10.1 interface eth-0-1

COMMAND.name: no static-group
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to delete IGMP snooping static group entry on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to delete IGMP snooping static group entry on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to delete IGMP snooping static group entry on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no static-group 224.10.10.1 interface eth-0-1

COMMAND.name: mrouter-aging-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping mrouter aging interval on specific VLAN. The parameter range is [1, 65535] seconds.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping mrouter aging interval on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure mrouter aging interval on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# mrouter-aging-interval 100

COMMAND.name: no mrouter-aging-interval
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to configure IGMP snooping mrouter aging interval on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to configure IGMP snooping mrouter aging interval on specific VLAN to default value.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to configure mrouter aging interval on specific VLAN 2 to default value: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no mrouter-aging-interval

COMMAND.name: mrouter interface
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to add IGMP snooping static mrouter interface on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to add IGMP snooping static mrouter interface on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to add IGMP snooping static mrouter interface on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# mrouter interface eth-0-1

COMMAND.name: no mrouter interface
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to delete IGMP snooping static mrouter interface on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to delete IGMP snooping static mrouter interface on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to delete IGMP snooping static mrouter interface on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no mrouter interface eth-0-1

COMMAND.name: access-group
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to add or overwrite IGMP snooping access list group on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to add or overwrite IGMP snooping access list group on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to add or overwrite IGMP snooping access list group on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# access-group abc

COMMAND.name: no access-group
COMMAND.CTCDESCRIPTION: Use this command to delete IGMP snooping access list group on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCUSAGE: This command is used to delete IGMP snooping access list group on specific VLAN.
COMMAND.CTCEXAMPLE: This example shows how to delete IGMP snooping access list group on specific VLAN 2: Switch(config)# ip igmp snooping vlan 2 Switch(config-igmp-snooping-2)# no access-group
